nodes.bodyText:
I am wondering whether replaceTabAlias should be in the operator conf (OperatorDesc). There is an AbstractOperatorDesc which could hold the default logic. Then it could be exposed here by simply calling conf.replaceTabAlias (single implementation for all operators).
The advantage that I see is that you would force any custom operator that does not inherit AbstractOperatorDesc to implement this method (I know we do not introduce such operators that much -or at all- but it seems to me it may make sense from the separation of concepts perspective).
yes; it would make sense to do that - I've opened HIVE-24382
